abstract: Credit Suisse, has hired Lesley D. Goldwasser to oversee a new effort to offer capital-markets financing to hedge funds along with advice and services.
snippet: Credit Suisse, has hired Lesley D. Goldwasser to oversee a new effort to offer capital-markets financing to hedge funds along with advice and services.
lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse, has hired Lesley D. Goldwasser to oversee a new effort to offer capital-markets financing to hedge funds along with advice and services, Bloomberg News reported.
